ai-atk-s0402a58:1_1: The third method of explanation apprehending the first, etc.
ai-atk-s0402a58:1_2: He who thinks about the ten practices, this is called:
ai-atk-s0402a58:1_3: When you hear this, what you’ve heard:
ai-atk-s0402a58:1_4: The one who builds the meaning is this:
ai-atk-s0402a58:1_5: One who stops at that moment, like one who draws on to its own wounds and embarras itself.
ai-atk-s0402a58:2_0: The third sub-chapter on bad conduct is finished.
